title: Hero Generations v1.16
description:
Hero Generations - Copyright 2011-2015 Heart Shaped Games LLC, All Rights Reserved.

Version 1.16 - Final, Released on 4/13/15

For more information, support, and pre-order options visit http://www.herogenerations.com

Join our community at http://www.heartshapedgames.com/forums/

Visit our website and forums to learn about our recent changes, and if there is a newer version of the game available!

About the Game:
Hero Generations is an innovative roguelike/4X strategy game where every turn is one year of your life. Explore a procedurally generated world, gain fame, find a mate, build a home, and raise a child before you die to keep your legacy going. Praised as "the offspring of Sid Meier's Civilization, Jason Rohrer's Passage, and The Legend of Zelda." 2011 IndieCade Finalist. Funded via Kickstarter - thanks to our 2,355 amazing backers!


Movement: Left Click the 4 adjacent spaces next to your hero to move them. You can also click the square your character is currently standing on to have your character stay put for a year.

UI: Left click any button to activate. Hover over icons and world objects to reveal tool-tip information.

-Keyboard- 

Arrow Keys or WASD: move character.

ENTER: Close message boxes and Selects flip cards during the flip card game. On the field, it will allow you to enter into towns and other buildings that allow that action.

SPACE: quick key for staying in the same location to let a year pass.

Q: Toggle the "Quests" menu on and off.
B: Toggle the "Special Towns" info panel on and off.
1-6 Number Keys: quick keys for building options when they are visible at the bottom of the screen
